attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to petition the government to increase wages country wide to reflect the cost of living.
People in this country are tired of never being able to get on top of the basics, then the following year all the costs go up but most wages stay the same and rarely reflect the increases.

Increased wages would ensure more ability to spend and support the retail market, decrease the instances of credit cards being used to pay day to day basic bills we can all no longer afford to pay out of just our income.
Also if the wages were higher there would be more insentive for people on benefits to get a job and improve their standard of living. Getting a job should not mean your standard of living drops.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
